医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，模仿禁食饮食对心血管健康具有独特的益处研究比较了模拟禁食饮食和地中海饮食在降低患有高血压的肥胖成人心血管疾病风险方面的作用，揭示了每种饮食的独特益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Fasting-mimicking-diet-shows-unique-benefits-in-cardioangiography-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Fasting-mimicking-diet-shows-unique-benefits-in-cardioangiography-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b876c762-c1be-469f-9725-d2183e0be39b Sun, 17 Dec 2023 19:45:00 -0500 Fasting-mimicking diet shows unique benefits in cardiovascular health, study finds
研究显示，空气污染与中风和痴呆症转变的风险增加有关研究发现，长期暴露在空气污染中会增加中风转变为痴呆的风险，强调需要更严格的空气质量控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-dementia-transition-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-中风-and-dementia-transition-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28300e01-4815-49b2-b9cc-18f415d18f4c Sun, 17 Dec 2023 19:37:00 -0500 Air pollution linked to increased risk of stroke and dementia transition, study reveals
研究表明深夜进食与心血管疾病风险增加有关研究发现，进餐时间，尤其是深夜进食，与心血管疾病的风险增加有关，这凸显了进餐时间对心脏代谢健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Late-night-eating-linked-to-higher-cardiovian-disease-risk-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Late-night-eating-linked-to-higher-cardioangio-disease-risk-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3761fbca-f7de-4a98-a8cd-0deac7a59845 Sun, 17 Dec 2023 19:25:00 -0500 Late-night eating linked to higher cardiovascular disease risk, study suggests
研究支持限制红肉摄入量以预防 2 型糖尿病，并强调替代蛋白质来源研究发现，食用红肉、加工肉和未加工肉会显着增加患 2 型糖尿病的风险，这表明用坚果、豆类和乳制品替代肉类的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Study-supports-limiting-red-meat-intake-for-type-2-diabetes-prevention-highlights-alternative- Protein-sources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Study-supports-limiting-red-meat-intake-for-type-2-diabetes-prevention-highlights-alternative- Protein-sources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb55942-80ce-44c6-a2cf-b501d9ffd3d1 Sun, 17 Dec 2023 19:10:00 -0500 Study supports limiting red meat intake for type 2 diabetes prevention, highlights alternative protein sources
研究显示代谢综合征与较高的胰腺癌风险相关研究发现代谢综合征与胰腺癌风险增加之间存在显着关联，凸显了代谢综合征预防和管理的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Metabolic-syndrome-linked-to-higher-pancreatic-cancer-risk-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Metabolic-syndrome-linked-to-higher-pancreatic-cancer-risk-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ed407b2-cce6-4e80-af52-75869553ddf3 Sun, 17 Dec 2023 19:02:00 -0500 Metabolic syndrome linked to higher pancreatic cancer risk, study shows
研究人员确定了中风后认知能力下降的关键危险因素研究确定了中风后认知障碍和痴呆的关键危险因素，强调早期发现和管理这些疾病的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Researchers-identify-crucial-risk-factors-for-cognitive-decline-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Researchers-identify-crucial-risk-factors-for-cognitive-decline-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b54ed570-682a-49a8-bead-d22219a8683f Sun, 17 Dec 2023 18:43:00 -0500 Researchers identify crucial risk factors for cognitive decline after stroke
全球研究强调早期发现青少年家族性高胆固醇血症对来自 48 个国家的儿童和青少年的家族性高胆固醇血症的研究强调了早期发现和管理以预防心血管疾病的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Global-study-emphasizes-early-detection-of-familial-hypercholesterolaemia-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Global-study-emphasizes-early-detection-of-familial-hypercholesterolaemia-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eccb4e80-ed08-4f42-b18a-fa04f6d4a772 Sun, 17 Dec 2023 18:35:00 -0500 Global study emphasizes early detection of familial hypercholesterolaemia in youth
研究揭示了全球实验室获得性感染和病原体逃逸研究分析了 2000 年至 2021 年全球实验室获得性感染和病原体意外逃逸事件，强调需要改进生物安全协议和报告系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Study-sheds-light-on-global-laboratory-acquired-infections-and-pathogen-escapes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Study-sheds-light-on-global-laboratory-acquired-infections-and-pathogen-escapes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ab89c2c-7000-4dbf-a5a6-474ee55894e0 Sun, 17 Dec 2023 18:24:00 -0500 Study sheds light on global laboratory-acquired infections and pathogen escapes
研究强调学龄前儿童睡眠障碍与行为问题之间的联系研究表明，学龄前儿童的睡眠障碍与情绪和行为困难 (EBD) 之间存在显着关联，并强调了这一点的重要性https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Study-highlights-link- Between-sleep-disturbances-and-behavioral-issues-in-preschool-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231217/Study-highlights-link- Between-sleep-disturbances-and-behavioral-issues-in-preschool-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fb502e8-44b9-465e-8a3f-31ffc3800102 Sun, 17 Dec 2023 18:12:00 -0500 Study highlights link between sleep disturbances and behavioral issues in preschool children
随着电子烟通过社交媒体传播，迫切需要采取行动昆士兰大学的一个研究项目将调查年轻人吸电子烟背后的网络影响，并开发社交媒体内容来支持他们戒烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Urgent-need-for-action-as-vaping-spreads-through-social-media.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231215/Urgent-need-for-action-as-vaping-spreads-through-social-media.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a97ec6a3-f97c-42fd-92ba-03bbe2c872e9 Fri, 15 Dec 2023 14:08:00 -0500 Urgent need for action as vaping spreads through social media
